backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user profiles, permissions, posts, comments, likes, and suspension checks with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and test IDs for the delete-post UI flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base utility layers.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point configuring meta tags, icons, manifest, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining the app name, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, username setup flow, navigation, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen with branding and Internet Identity sign-in handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Renders a post’s comments and provides UI for adding and liking comments with suspension and validation checks.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeletePostD: Confirmation dialog for deleting a post using a mutation with success/error handling and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Renders a post with author info, content, image, like button, comments, and menus for reporting or deleting depending on ownership.
Defines the main app layout with header, unread notifications badge, content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomNav.ts: Provides a fixed bottom navigation bar with buttons to switch between core app pages.
frontend/src/components/polls/WeeklyPoll: Displays the weekly poll with voting, state messaging, and results depending on poll status.
frontend/src/components/profile/Username: Modal for validating and submitting a new username using mutation logic with error handling.
frontend/src/components/reporting/Report: Dialog for confirming and submitting a user account report with status feedback.
Dialog for reporting a post, submitting a mutation, and creating a local notification for the reporter.
frontend/src/constants/uploads.ts: Defines allowed image MIME types and the maximum upload file size.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, posts, and interactions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuspensionStatus.t: Computes whether the current user is suspended based on their profile and returns suspension state info.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and color variables for light/dark themes with additional utility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Defines a list of banned terms and functions to normalize text and detect inappropriate content.
frontend/src/moderation/validateTextCont: Validates text content for emptiness and disallowed terms.
frontend/src/moderation/validateUsername: Validates usernames for length, allowed characters, and disallowed terms.
frontend/src/notifications/localNotifica: Implements localStorage‑based read/write utilities for storing and updating user notifications.
frontend/src/notifications/notificationT: Defines notification types and the notification data structure.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: UI and logic for creating posts, including content validation, image upload, and suspension checks.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the post feed with refresh controls and includes the weekly poll panel.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications, showing icons, timestamps, and marking items as read when clicked.
frontend/src/pages/PollsPage.tsx: Renders the weekly poll page using the WeeklyPollPanel component.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile details, suspension status, and logout functionality with informational cards.
frontend/src/polls/extractWeeklyTopics.t: Extracts top weekly topics from posts/comments by normalizing text, filtering stop words, and ranking by frequency.
frontend/src/polls/localPollStore.ts: Manages poll state in localStorage, including creation, retrieval, week checks, and submitting votes.
frontend/src/polls/pollTimeWindow.ts: Defines poll timing logic and computes current week ID and voting/result visibility windows.
frontend/src/polls/useWeeklyPoll.ts: Hook that initializes weekly polls, handles voting, generates topics, and manages poll state updates.
frontend/src/utils/imageFileValidation.t: Validates image uploads by checking file type and size limits.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats timestamps into relative times and formats suspension end dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, and clearing URL parameters, including session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, including summary, architecture notes, features, and configuration for the Hornet Hive mobile app.
